subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: Michael Edwards
full_text:
--0-345260366-1205876564=:4440
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Hi Bruce, yeah I am new to the group. 4 weeks now.  I have other files loaded, and only load what is closer to class "A"  EVP.  
   
  I am using the radio shack hack 12-469.
   
  I record usually in the morning. I work from home, and wait until the kids and wife are out of the house, so I have no interruptions.
   
  My personal interest is to make contact with my family members and friends that have passed on. I have so many questions to ask them, etc....
   
  Tips are welcome.. I still am playing with the sound of the radio when in scan mode. Trying to get the volume just right where if i did hear a spirit, the sound of the radio does not drown it out.
   
  Any advice you can give me after listening to my files, that would be great!
   
  Mike Edwards Cary NC

bruce halliday <paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:
          Hi Mike,
 
I have just returned to this group after a short absence.
My name is Bruce I have exstensive experience with box research and do my own research with every type of box that is available including the newest Frank's box that is out.
I hear a female response saying "YES" at the very end of the file.
 
What box are you using? if you can Mike keep your questions as short and to the point as possible, the longer your speaking the more chance of stepping on a message or answer.
Plus the shorter and more direct the question the easier it will be for them to answer in a reasonable ammount of time. If you don't mind me asking, how long are you involved in box research?
 
I do not remember you the last time I participated here. If you have any questions or I can help you with anything just let me know.
 
Bruce


  Bruce Halliday 




    
---------------------------------
  From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Tue, 18 Mar 2008 18:37:24 +0000
Subject: [EVP-ITC] New file uploaded to EVP-ITC

      
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

File : /Mike Edwards Files/Question to Shay Clark and a voice said yes.wav 
Uploaded by : f1cracker75 <f1cracker75@...> 
Description : I asked a deceased friend named Shay Clark if he could help me get in touch with my father who died in 1987. I believe I received a yes. Please advise if any of you hear different. The yes is near the end 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Mike%20Edwards%20Files/Question%20to%20Shay%20Clark%20and%20a%20voice%20said%20yes.wav 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

f1cracker75 <f1cracker75@...>
